input.sentences: a few folks from town are going to help move our new treadmill into our old farmhouse .
this thing is heavy and awkward to carry ! it takes four men to carry it .
they make good progress though as they learn to work together well .
the hardest part was definitely getting it through the front door !
with the task complete | they head off to the town bar to get a couple drinks .
output.sentences: When they moved to a house in a new town, they had to work to get the treadmill in through the door.
It was so heavy several men had to carry it in.
Moving it and working with others was a learning process.
The hardest part was the door.
This is the head mover for the town.
